mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewboarddto (pno, rvTitle, rvContent, rvWriter, rvRegDate) VALUES (#{pno}, #{rvTitle}, #{rvContent}, #{rvWriter}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT rvno, r.pno, rvTitle, rvContent, rvWriter, rvRegDate, p.productName FROM reviewboarddto r INNER JOIN productdto p ON r.pno = p.pno WHERE r.pno = #{pno} ORDER BY rvno DESC
